00019 #ifndef _FFT_ACTION_FIND_PEAK_HPP_cm101026_
00020 #define _FFT_ACTION_FIND_PEAK_HPP_cm101026_
00021 
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <stdexcept>
00025 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/property_tree/ptree.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/make_shared.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include "Spectrum.hpp"
00031 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/SpectrumPeak.hpp"
00032 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/Calibration.hpp"
00033 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/CalibratedSpectrumPeak.hpp"
00034 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/PowerSpectrumLine.hpp"
00035 #include "FFTProcessor/Proxy.hpp"
00036 #include "FFTProcessor/Action/SpectrumInterval.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace Action {
00039   class FindPeak : public SpectrumInterval {
00040   public:
00041     FindPeak(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00042       : SpectrumInterval(config)
00043       , fReference_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fRef_Hz"))
00044       , minRatio_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.minRatio")) {
00045       name_ = "FindPeak";
00046     }
00047     virtual ~FindPeak() {}
00048     virtual void proc(Proxy::Base& p, 
00049                       const SpectrumBase& s,
00050                       const PowerSpectrum& ps) {
00051       try {
00052         const Proxy::Base::ptime t(p.getApproxPTime());
00053         Result::SpectrumPeak::Handle 
00054           spp((useCalibration())
00055               ? boost::make_shared<Result::CalibratedSpectrumPeak>
00056               (t, fReference_, boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Result::Calibration>(p.getResult(calibrationKey())))
00057               : boost::make_shared<Result::SpectrumPeak>(t, fReference_));
00058         if (spp->findPeak(p, s, ps, minRatio_))
00059           p.putResult(resultKey(), spp);
00060         if (plotSpectrum())
00061           p.putResult(resultKey()+"_plot",
00062                       boost::make_shared<Result::PowerSpectrumLine>(t, ps));
00063       } catch (const std::exception& e) {
00064         LOG_WARNING(e.what());
00065       }
00066     }
00067   private:
00068     const double fReference_;          // nominal frequency / Hz
00069     const double minRatio_;            // min. ratio peak/background
00070   } ;
00071 } // namespace Action
00072 
00073 #endif // _FFT_ACTION_FIND_PEAK_HPP_cm101026_
